node.name: logical-network-elements
node.description: Allows a network device to support multiple logical network element (device) instances.None

node.name: name
node.description: Device-wide unique identifier for the logical network element.None

node.name: managed
node.description: True if the host can access LNE information using the root mount point. This value may not be modifiable in all implementations.None

node.name: description
node.description: Description of the logical network element.None

node.name: bind-lne-name-failed
node.description: Indicates an error in the association of an interface to an LNE. Only generated after success is initially returned when bind-lne-name is set.None

node.name: name
node.description: Contains the interface name associated with the failure.None

node.name: bind-lne-name
node.description: Contains the bind-lne-name associated with the failure.None

node.name: error-info
node.description: Optionally, indicates the source of the assignment failure.None
